tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Through this post I am just sharing my experience with TOSH hospital, Kilpauk. For my nagging right shoulder pain for the past 1 year and (after exhausting all conservative and other treatments)  I decided to undergo Arthroscopy surgery by Dr Jaheer Hussain. 
 He meticulously and patiently went  through my reports, MRI etc and explained in detail what exactly my problem is and how he is going to perform the surgery through  his video presentation and how the problems are going to be fixed. I underwent surgery 6 weeks back and from day one I was confident that I was under safe hands. After succeesful surgery now I am in stage 3 of physio therapy,  sling removed and there is remarkable recovery. There was no problem  at all in the shoulder excepting very minor pain which i managed without pain killers . I should express my gratitude to Dr and his assistant
 Dr Prabhu and the friendly  reception team . I should thank the Almighty for taking me to this hospital.

My father K Ramesh Babu had Knee Laproscopy surgery in Jan, 2020. We are from Hyderabad and traveled Chennai to undergo this procedure. 

As opposed to all our fears, the hospital, hospital staff and "Dr Jaheer Hussain"(special thanks to him) provided utmost care and has been supportive throughout the process. Team was impressive, particularly Dr Prabhu Manikyam guided me before and after surgery. The procedure was exactly the way it was explained to us. The facilities provided at the hospital was very good. Post operative care, physiotherapy, and post operative recovery is very satisfactory.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Both my parents tested positive, Mr Hussain was so patient and calm in explaining everything and was so helpful. Would higher recommend people to  Tosh and especially to Mr. Hussain
